user_query: I'm organizing a conference on sustainable living and need some data for my presentation. Can you calculate the CO2e emissions from the use of traditional hydro energy? Also, provide me with guidelines on reducing carbon footprint in daily life and suggest some eco-friendly products for conference giveaways.

TaskList.description: Calculate the CO2e emissions from the use of traditional hydro energy.
Gather guidelines for reducing carbon footprint in daily life.
Research and suggest eco-friendly products suitable for conference giveaways.
